p: Thus, it is hard to conclude how representative these tests are of the true ESW. No strict rules are established for evaluating the ESW, even if low scanning rates seem like they would be beneficial, and it is difficult to get a satisfying conclusion about the realistic impact of these values [ 114]. Other factors such as how long the system experiences the potential, the analysis volume, and the non-mobility of the polymer (for SPE) must be addressed. Nevertheless, this methodology has changed little over time [ 115, 116, 117, 118].
